name: BLU
description:
Are you ready for nonstop action? If you are, BLU is finally here to give you the endless combat you deserve! Jump into this new world as a blue cube named BLU. But beware, enemies pose a threat to you! 

Fight your way through endless waves of colorful cubes, but be warned. The longer you play, the WORSE IT GETS! 

(How to play is implemented in the game itself, no need to read it off here!)

Just in case, turn down your volume.
